title: Teacher-Centered Online Program for Leadership Development: Targeting Mathematics Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Leadership Concepts and Elementary-Level Expertise in Mathematics
context.additional_context: A customized leadership program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, focusing on practical competency enhancement through mathematical problem-solving processes. Applies flexible instructional design reflecting complex systems theory while maintaining teacher-centered learning approaches

learning_goals: Learners can apply leadership theories (transformational, servant leadership, etc.) to mathematical modeling and analyze specific cases.
Learners can design effective decision-making processes for team problem-solving based on teacher-created cases provided in the LMS.
Learners can diagnose leadership styles and establish improvement plans through formative assessments (quizzes, case study reports).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
